```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)
source("helper.R")
```

```{r}
raw_data <- read.csv("data/master.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r}
q <- 'What.are.the.effects.of.your.pain...Please.select.all.that.apply.'
q_final_response <- "X.81"
t <- "What are the effects of your pain? (Please select all that apply)"
q_data <- get_choose_all(raw_data, q.name = q, f.response = q_final_response) %>%
  tidy_choose_all()
q_n <- length(unique(q_data$id))
q_plot <- clean_choose_all(q_data)
r <- plot_choose_all(q_plot)
r
```

```{r}
q_plot2 <- rbind(q_plot, t)
dir.create("output/q14_pain_effects")
ggsave(filename = 'output/q14_pain_effects/q14_pain_effects.png', plot = r, device = 'png')
write.csv(q_plot2, paste0("output/q14_pain_effects/q14_pain_effects_", q_n,".csv"), row.names=F)
write.csv(q_data, 'output/q14_pain_effects/q14_pain_effects_ids.csv', row.names = FALSE)
```
